cards.skill_disc: Countdown (2) br>Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand. br>Until this amulet leaves play, all allied followers in play and all allied followers that come into play have Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
cards.org_skill_disc: [b]Countdown[/b] [b](2)[/b] br>[b]Fanfare[/b][b]:[/b] Put 2 [b]Fairies[/b] into your hand. br>Until this amulet leaves play, all allied followers in play and all allied followers that come into play have [b]Clash[/b][b]:[/b] Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
cards.description: Eek! You're scaring me! Don't come any closer, okay? —Bramble Fairy
One day, the rest of the pack will accept me as one of their own. There's no way I can lose here! Focus... I have to give it my all!
cards.evo_description: One day, I'll fight alongside the rest of the pack. I just need to prove myself! Focus... Victory is near. I can feel it!

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Banish this follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
cards.org_skill_disc: [b]Fanfare[/b][b]:[/b] Banish this follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
cards.description: Gliding upon the wind, as if to illuminate the canopy of the forest—but try and catch a glimpse, they'll vanish without a trace.
cards.evo_description: Gliding upon the wind, gently floating as if willed by the forest itself—even now, they continue to flutter and flicker.

cards.skill_disc: Draw 2 cards. br>Enhance (2): Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
cards.org_skill_disc: Draw 2 cards. br>[b]Enhance[/b] [b](2)[/b][b]:[/b] Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
cards.description: The noble shimmer of life for you, noble one. —Yggdrasil
